amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that the definition of "demonstration project" refers to projects that are receiving Federal Government funding or financial assistance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 113-373 to clarify that the definition of "demonstration project" refers to projects that are receiving federal government funding or financial assistance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Latta amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Latta amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Latta.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
